message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm starting with a price of $150.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  I'm interested in the product but I can offer $85. What do you think?
Bob, thanks for your offer. $85 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $120. This is a good deal, and it reflects the value of the product. Let's make this happen!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  $120 is still a little high for me, though.  I'm ready to buy right now if you can come down to $100.  Let me know what you think!
